dc:title: On Pilgrimage - February 1974
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Reflects on a number of economic themes: the building of churches; problems with the IRS; why they are not tax-exempt; personalist/anarchist writers and projects; Ade Bethune's Community Corporation in Rhode Island. Extols all forms of mutual aid.
